9 out of 10 peers that i'm currently connected to have blocked their uploud speed to others and only leech. How can you be so greedy 
This is going to be a long time before you all see another seeder cause i block my uploud to these leechers as well, and now instead  of uplouding with full speed i do with only 20kb to one peer.

This isn't true BluRay formatted rips.  True rips are ~2.19GB an episode.  I have Seasons 1-3 in this format and it's a little over 75GB, so these seem to just be HDTV rips...not bad by any means, just not the quality of my 2.19GB rips.

Yes these are bluray rips.
And you can always download an episode to check the quality .
there is no such thing as true bluray rips.
you can rip at any size you want.
yea nuke size has nothing to do with the source. you could rip a bluray into a 400 meg file if u wanted.
